# [Interview #849: Memories of Light, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=849#6)

#### Day 6

The right thing had always seemed clear to Galad before, but never had it felt as right as this. Those streaks of light were like indicators on a map, arrows pointing his way. The Light itself guided him. It had prepared him, placed him here at this moment. (p. 725)
